definition: to take one's revenge/to score off sb

sentences.english: For instance, Christmas gifts and toys, they are exported around the world.
sentences.chinese: 例如，圣诞礼品和玩具，它们是出口世界各地。

sentences.english: We also do import and export business in chemicals and agricultural products.
sentences.chinese: 我公司还经营化学产品和家产品进出口的业务。

sentences.english: Trace hooks can be applied at the entry or exit of any function.
sentences.chinese: 跟踪钩子可以应用于任何函数的入口或出口。

sentences.english: Europe and Russia accounted for bulk of tobacco exports in the current year.
sentences.chinese: 欧洲和俄罗斯占本年度烟草出口的大部分。

sentences.english: So export issue of China's furniture industry was studied in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 鉴此，本文对中国家具行业的出口问题进行了研究。

sentences.english: Our company is an enterprise which is invested by Hong Kong investor only and manages businesses independently.
sentences.chinese: 我公司是港商独资企业，自主经营进出口业务。

sentences.english: Our peripheries are the professional markets of cellular phone accessories and the electronics product export.
sentences.chinese: 我们的周边是手机配件及电子产品出口的专业市场。

sentences.english: Opening the door in an emergency will automatically  inflate the evacuation slides.
sentences.chinese: 打开紧急出口的门会自动充气逃离滑梯。

sentences.english: Farmers are revolting over a new sliding-scale increase in export taxes.
sentences.chinese: 农场主对新出台的出口税率浮动上调政策非常不满。

sentences.english: There were no entrances or exits, and players could only leave by hearthing out;
sentences.chinese: 既没有入口也没有出口，玩家只能炉石出去。

sentences.english: The first skid-mounted drilling rigs exported to Hungary were manufactured by RG PETRO-MACHINERY(GROUP)CO. , LTD.
sentences.chinese: 第一台出口欧盟的钻机由南阳二机石油装备集团制造。

sentences.english: Your company is a leading dealer in import and export of hi-tech instruments in China.
sentences.chinese: 贵公司是中国最大的高科技设备进出口商。

sentences.english: Perhaps an import-export situation will need all your tender loving care.
sentences.chinese: 可能是一个需要你全部细致照料的进出口买卖。

sentences.english: They've had their revenge more or less.
Self-developed products of Contec have been exported to more than 150 countries and regions.
sentences.chinese: 公司自主研发的产品已出口到150多个国家和地区。

sentences.english: Products to local market and exported to international markets.
sentences.chinese: 产品行销全国各地，并出口国际市场。

definition: to import/imported/entrance/inlet (for the intake of air, water etc)

to sell in the domestic market/domestic market
general trade (i.e. importing and export without processing)
to turn one's head/to turn round/to turn about
